page.title: 01 A GENERAL PICTURE
page.content:
A leafy suburb of Sheffield with the river that gives Sheffield its name running through it, namely the {River Sheaf.}There is much natural woodland,Ecclesall Woods,which is owned by the council,and also two parks,{Millhouses Park}and{Graves {Park.}Millhouses Park has an open air swimming pool.Graves Park is the largest in Sheffield with much to offer including a miniature farm.
The{Abbeydale Industrial Hamlet,} {Beauchief Abbey}and part of Beauchief Golf Course are found in this residential area.Woodseats has an excellent shopping area, with shops ranging from bakeries to kitchen planning.
Derbyshire,the{Peak District}and the South are easily accessible.
